RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 88. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race o n the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CLOUD FOREST coaxed from the gate, chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three then two wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong out, tussled with the runner up until able to pull away inside the final forty yards to prevail at the end. EGYPT coaxed from the start, showed the way in hand along the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was caught a furlong out, fought on inside to the finish to be along safe for the place honors. TREBLE CLEF three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. NEW YORK STRONG chased three wide until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. SCAT TU TAP coaxed from the gate, chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three to four wide for home and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Egypt
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand ins, coaxed 5/16, ins 1/4, caught, fought on

ENTRY.NAME: Scat Tu Tap
ENTRY.OWNER: Ziomber Michael WLIR Racing Stables McCourt Racing and Petruccelli Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, 3-4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: New York Strong
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3w, coaxed ins 3/8, angled 5w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Treble Clef
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 5-6w upper, mild kick

ENTRY.NAME: Cloud Forest
ENTRY.OWNER: Dark Horse Racing Stable Spiesman Rich Serio Racing Stables and Victory Circle R
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, coaxed 3/8, 3-2w uppr, up 1/8, prevailed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 36000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: JACKIE THE JOKER settled comfortably behind the leading trio, stalked three then four wide on the turn, was asked near the quarter-pole, rallied to the lead in upper stretch, drifted in under a right-handed crop outside the furlong marker, switched to a left-handed crop inside that marker and held under strong urging. MERAVIGLIOSO was hustled from the gate, showed good speed on the inside of two foes, chased along the rail onthe turn, came off the inside into upper stretch, moved further out near the furlong marker and safely secured the place. QUEEN ARELLA showed speed on the outside, chased in the three path on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive, pursued the leader into the final furlong and weakened. MISS DOMINA was hustled to the front, showed the way while off the inside, went around the turn in the two path, was asked near the quarter-pole, lost the advantage in upper stretch and gave way. DIVA BANKER bumped with a foe early, was urged along at the rear on the outside, went four wide o n the turn, came five wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. ALPINE QUEEN bumped with an opponent early, moved in while hard ridden near the back, saved ground on the turn and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Meraviglioso
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,speed ins,chased rail turn,2p3/16,mvd out 1/8,clear place

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Domina
ENTRY.OWNER: R A Hill Stable and Reeves Thoroughbred Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,pace,2p turn,asked1/4,headed3/16,gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Queen Arella
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed outside,chased 3path turn,weakened,held show

ENTRY.NAME: Alpine Queen
ENTRY.OWNER: FIN Stables and Sal-Lou J G Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd early,hard ridden,inside turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Diva Banker
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd early,urged along,4wide turn,5w into lane,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Jackie the Joker
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,stalked 3-4path turn,rallied,lead3/16,drift in out1/8,clr

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Purse 80000. OUTER TURF FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 12 3 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 24 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FACTUALLY CORRECT five wide in aim of the top pair, tucked three wide settling just off the duel through the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command near the eighth pole, drew clear under a drive to prevail. ICY FLAVOR coaxed from the gate, dueled from the three path down the backstretch before tucking inside through the turn, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared near the eighth pole, ran on to be along clear of the rest and second best. THANK YOU JON broke out at the start trading a bump with BLAME IT ON DADDY, raced seven paths off the inside down the backstretch and then four wide through the turn coming under coaxing nearing the quarter pole, swung five wide into upper stretch, kept on to secure the show honors. EMPIRE SKY chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the half mile pole, angled seven wide into upper stretch, improved position to the finish. DREAMPOINT coaxed from the start, chased three to four wide until tucked to the two path half a mile from home, went six wide into upper stretch, passed tired rivals. COURAGEOOUS OH LA coaxed from the start, raced forwardly placed four wide down the backstretch before advancing to duel with ICY FLAVOR to his inside, tucked to the two path through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide for home and weakened. BLAME IT ON DADDY broke in at the start trading a bump with THANK YOU JON, chased eight paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn, went six wide into upper stretch and offered no response. KREESA chased just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and tired. PLAYINGWITHMATCHES chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn under coaxing from midway, went seven to eight wide into upper stretch and tired. THE COBBLER coaxed from the gate, chased along the inside under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, continued along the inside route into upper stretch, made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Icy Flavor
ENTRY.OWNER: Donald R Dizney LLC and Strauss William
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, dueled 3p, ins turn, inside 1/4, collared, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Kreesa
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, 2w 1/4p, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Courageoous Oh La
ENTRY.OWNER: Dixon Linda K and Alejandro Hector M
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, dueled 4-2w, coaxed 5/16, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: The Cobbler
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased ins, coaxed 7/16, inside 1/4, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Dreampoint
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-4w, coaxed 2p 1/2p, 6w upper, by tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Empire Sky
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5-4w, coaxed 1/2, angled 7w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Thank You Jon
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out st, 7w backstretch, 4w turn, 5w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Blame It On Daddy
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, 8w backstretch, 2p turn, 6w upper, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Factually Correct
ENTRY.OWNER: Cotrone Robert Imperio Michael Gurdon Andrew O Rodriguez Rudy R Gabrielle Farm M
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w in aim, 3w off duel turn, 4w upper, up near 1/8, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Playingwithmatches
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w backstretch, 3w turn, coaxed 3/8, 7-8w upper, tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 77. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race wil l be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MOST OF ALL showed early speed then tracked the pace on the outside, made a bid with a half-mile to run, took the lead in the three path outside the three-eighths, moved clear outside the quarter-pole, responded well when shaken up some in upper stretch, drew off into the final furlong and proved much the best while geared down to win handily. MAGIC EIGHT BALL ducked in at the start, moved up to get the lead outside the three-quarter pole then went clear inside that pole, was challenged by the winner at the half-mile pole, vied inside on the turn, lost the advantage outside the three-eighths, dropped back coming to the quarter-pole and proved no match for the winner while able to hold the place. PAST TENSE was unsettled in the gate then off slow and spotted the front a few lengths, moved out early then settled on the outside, went around the turn in the two path and lacked the needed response while best of the rest. TRUE MYTH showed speed then chased the pace, moved out late on the backstretch, went four then five wide on the turn and came up empty. NOT TONIGHT JOE was off slow and spotted the front a few lengths, raced at the rear under urging, saved ground on the turn, came three wide into the stretch and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Magic Eight Ball
ENTRY.OWNER: Rocco Steven and The Estate of Brereton C Jones
ENTRY.COMMENT: ducked in brk,mvd up,lead3/4,pace,ins,headed3/8,no match

ENTRY.NAME: True Myth
ENTRY.OWNER: Gatsas Stables R A Hill Stable and Schoenfeld Steven
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed,chased,mvd out 1/2,4-5path turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Past Tense
ENTRY.OWNER: Harold Lerner LLC and Team D
ENTRY.COMMENT: unsettled gate,off slow,mvd out,settled,2path turn,best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Not Tonight Joe
ENTRY.OWNER: Lucky Hat Racing LLC and V Hop Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow, urged along, inside turn, 3w into lane, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Most of All
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed,tracked outside,bid1/2,3p,lead3/8,drew off,geared down

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 68. Maiden Claiming Purse 38000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUN AND WIND coaxed along lightly showing the way from the two path under pressure from MEL'S ANGEL to the outside, tucked inside through the turn and dueled with that rival, swung three wide into upper stretch, rallied to take back the front at the three-sixteenths and edged away under a drive kept to task. POSEIDON'S MIST six paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked inside through the turn, was approaching the quarter pole when appearing to spook outwards bobbling before ending up just off the heels of ELLA SPEED, bobbled again when making some clipping contact with the rear of that rival, the rider showing strong balance to remain upright through both bobbles, took the inside route into upper stretch roused and offered up a mild kick showing good courage to close in for the place honors clear of the rest. MEL'S ANGEL prompted the pace five to six paths off the inside before tucking three wide into the turn advancing to duel for command, took over with five-sixteenths to go, swung four to five wide into upper stretch, drifted out and yielded the front at the three-sixteenths, then weakened in the late stages. BORNFORGREATNESS coaxed from the gate, chased four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch, improved position to secure the last major share. LET'S CONNECT chased three to four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, went seven wide into upper stretch, passed tired rivals. LONE STAR WILDCAT chased three wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, went six to seven wide into upper stretch, passed tired foes to the finish. NOTAFRAIDTOCHARGE chased three to four wide until tucked to the two path through the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three to four wide for home, weakened. ALOTTA JAYS coaxed from the start, chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coaxed along from the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. ELLA SPEED chased along the inside under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, appeared to get clipped behind by POSEIDON'S MIST nearing the quarter pole and swung three wide into upper stretch, then tired in the stretch. SONG OF SOLOMINI coaxed from the gate, chased three then two wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, went six wide into upper stretch, tired. REGENERATOR chased five wide under coaxing from midway on the turn, swung four wide into upper stretch and tired. PRINCESS BECCA chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled out six wide into upper stretch, made no impact.

ENTRY.NAME: Ella Speed
ENTRY.OWNER: Gold Star Racing Stable and Three Oates Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 7/16, clipped beh near 1/4, 3w uppr, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Let's Connect
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-4w, coaxed 3/8, 7w upper, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Sun and Wind
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed 2p, dueled ins turn, 3w upper, back up 3/16, edged away

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Sequel New York & Stonegate Stables LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Song of Solomini
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 7/16, 6w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Bornforgreatness
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Lone Star Wildcat
ENTRY.OWNER: Moirano John L Foss Monty Pines Stables Wecker Steven Achenbaum William
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 6-7w upper, passed tired rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Regenerator
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Notafraidtocharge
ENTRY.OWNER: Mercurio Matthew J Cotrone Robert and Rodriguez Rudy R
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-4w backstretch, 2p turn, coaxed 3/8, 3-4w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Princess Becca
ENTRY.OWNER: The Warnick Stable and Hinkhouse Joseph A
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w backstretch, 3w turn, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Alotta Jays
ENTRY.OWNER: Rosenthal Robert D and Galloping Grocer Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 6w backstretch, 3w turn, 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Poseidon's Mist
ENTRY.COMMENT: 6w early, ins turn, spooked, bobbled 2x near 1/4, gd courage

ENTRY.NAME: Mel's Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted 5-6w, dueled 3w turn, 4-5w upper, drifted, wknd late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Knickerbocker S. BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 103. Stakes Purse 150000. OUTER TURF FOR THREE-YEAR-OLDS AND UPWARD. Non-Lasix Race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $150 each which should accompany the nomination; $750 to pass the entry box and an additional $750 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental nomination payment of $750 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the closing of entries. The purse to be divided 55% to the owner of the winner, 20% to se cond, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. Weights: Three year olds, 123 lbs. Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners of a Graded sweepstake on the turf in 2023 allowed 3 lbs.; of a sweepstakes other than sta te-bred in 2023 allowed 5 lbs. A trophy will be presented to the winning owner. The New York Racing Association reserves the right to transfer this race to the Main Track. In the event that this race is taken off the turf it may be subject to downgradingu
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PIONEERING SPIRIT prompted the pace on the outside in the two to three path, took over just inside the three-eighths pole, moved clear into the stretch, drew off while kept to the task into the final furlong then was eased up while clearly best. COMMANDEER was hustled to the front, showed the way on the inside of the winner while inside to the two path, lost the lead just inside the three-eighths pole and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Commandeer
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,ins foe,ins-2path,headed ins 3/8,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Pioneering Spirit
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted outside 2-3path,took over ins 3/8,drew away,eased up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 7F Dirt CR: 77. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PERLIANO dueled three then two wide with QUIET WISDOM to his outside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch, edged clear under a drive kept to task. QUIET WISDOM dueled four then three wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, went seven wide into upper stretch, got shaken off nearing the eighth pole and kept on to the finish to secure the place honors. PROPHETIC chased just off the inside down the backstretch and then along the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch and ran on to secure the show honors. BALI AMOUR broke in at the start, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went eight wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. PODERE broke a beat slow, chased three then two wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch, made no impact. THIS TIME YES chased three to four paths off the inside down the backstretch before tucking to the two path half a mile from home placed to coaxing, swung four wide into upper stretch and tired. BLUE MARBLE chased five paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung six wide into upper stretch and tired. JEFFERSONS OCEAN chased just off the inside until tucked inside half a mile from home, when placed to coaxing, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, faltered in the drive.

ENTRY.NAME: Jeffersons Ocean
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 1/2, 2w 1/4p, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: This Time Yes
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-4w backstretch, to 2p 1/2 coaxed, 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Prophetic
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 5/16, 3w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Perliano
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Marble
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w backstretch, coaxed 3w 7/16, 6w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Podere
ENTRY.COMMENT: off beat slw, chased 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, no impact

ENTRY.NAME: Bali Amour
ENTRY.OWNER: Whylie Herold O and Reid Sanchez J
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 5-4w, coaxed 3/8, 8w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Quiet Wisdom
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable and St Elias Stables LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 4-3w, coaxed near 1/4, 7w upper, shaken off, kept on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 91. Allowance Purse 80000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non- winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAMA'S GOLD went to the front, showed the way off the rail, traveled around the turn in the two path, extended the advantage coming to the quarter-pole, responded well when set down in upper stretch and held under strong urging. AMEDEUS MUSIC was off slow and spotted the front a few lengths, moved up to track the pace, chased in the three path on the turn, pursued the winner under a drive in the stretch and willingly earned the place. BOYS CODE was urged along at the rear, went four wide on the turn, came eight wide into the stretch and was along for the show. BOURBON CHASE bobbled slightly at the start then was hustled, settled off the pace, was roused while moving from the rail to the three path on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response. UNCLE MARTY settled off the pace, was urged two then three wide on the turn and was no factor. HERE'S WALDO was hustled from the gate then raced just off the pace, dropped back under urging late on the backstretch, fell further back while three then two wide on the turn and retreated. VETERANS BEACH reared at the start then came outward while off slow, spotted the front several lengths, moved up be forwardly placed on the outside, dropped back while moving from the four path to the two path on the turn and faltered.

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Chase
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled tad brk,hustled,settled,ask ins-3p turn,5w1/4,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Marty
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, urged 2-3path turn, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Mama's Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: to front,pace,2path turn,extended lead1/4,responded,held driving

ENTRY.NAME: Boys Code
ENTRY.OWNER: Dixon Linda K and Alejandro Hector M
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,well off pace,4path turn,8p into lane,up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Here's Waldo
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,just off pace,drop back 3-2path turn,retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Amedeus Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slow,mvd up,tracked,chased 3path turn,willingly for place

ENTRY.NAME: Veterans Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: reared brk,off slow,came outward,mvd up,4-2p turn,faltered

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 79. Maiden Claiming Purse 47000. OUTER TURF (UP TO $8,178 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 24 feet ).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SPUN SPECIAL chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung six to seven wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command nearing the eighth pole, then edged away under a drive to prevail. PARTY IS OVER chased six then five wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, went eight wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. LADY ASTORIA chased along the inside and then just off the inside coming under coaxing three furlongs out, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. NEGRA GATA showed the way in hand three then two wide coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared nearing the eighth pole, then weakened through to the finish. BOSTON STRONG MAMA five paths off the inside early on, crossed to the inside near the nine-sixteenths, came under coaxing with seven-sixteenths to go, swung two to three wide for home and tired. BOURBON AND HONEY chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung five wide into upper stretch, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Negra Gata
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 3-2w, coaxed near 1/4, 2w 1/4p, collared, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon and Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5-4w, coaxed 5/16, 5w upper, tired

ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w early, crossed to ins, coaxed 7/16, 2-3w upper, tired
